davisCopilot.prompt: show me total node count in k8s cluster

data.prompt: show me total node count in k8s cluster

1.query:
timeseries by:{k8s.namespace.name, k8s.deployment.name}, count_deployments = count(dt.kubernetes.pods)
| filter k8s.namespace.name == "default"
| summarize deployment_count = count()

davisCopilot.prompt: show me number of deployment in default namespace of kubernetes cluster

data.prompt: show me number of deployment in default namespace of kubernetes cluster
data.dql:
timeseries by:{k8s.namespace.name, k8s.deployment.name}, count_deployments = count(dt.kubernetes.pods)
| filter k8s.namespace.name == "default"
| summarize deployment_count = count()

2.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| fieldsAdd namespaceName
| summarize by:{namespaceName}, podCount = count()

davisCopilot.prompt: show me all the pods in all namespace of kubernets cluster and count them by namespace names

data.prompt: show me all the pods in all namespace of kubernets cluster and count them by namespace names
data.dql:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| fieldsAdd namespaceName
| summarize by:{namespaceName}, podCount = count()

3.query:
timeseries by:{k8s.pod.name, k8s.container.name}, filter:matchesValue(k8s.namespace.name, "default"), cpu_consumption = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage)
| sort arraySum(cpu_consumption) desc

davisCopilot.prompt: show me cpu consumtion by pod containers in default namespace and sort them in descending order

data.prompt: show me cpu consumtion by pod containers in default namespace and sort them in descending order
data.dql:
timeseries by:{k8s.pod.name, k8s.container.name}, filter:matchesValue(k8s.namespace.name, "default"), cpu_consumption = sum(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage)
| sort arraySum(cpu_consumption) desc

davisCopilot.prompt: list all the nodes in kubernetes cluster

data.prompt: list all the nodes in kubernetes cluster
